body_html:
You example has numerous syntax errors, but I think the underlying problem may be that you are passing incorrect values for the boxes arg, which should be relative coordinates in the range [0,1]

Please see the following documentation
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/image/cropping
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/crop_and_resize

Please let me know if this fixes your problem?

body:
You example has numerous syntax errors, but I think the underlying problem may be that you are passing incorrect values for the `boxes` arg, which should be _relative_ coordinates in the range [0,1]

Please see the following documentation
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/image/cropping
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/crop_and_resize

Please let me know if this fixes your problem?
